products.title: Lintex Pvc Blackout Taupe Brown Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Lintex pvc fabrics provide a nod to industrial styling, the fabric itself have a subtle tile look finish. Available in 5 earthy tones, the range perfectly compliments cool, modern interior styling. As these are a pvc fabric they are both flame retardant & moisture resitent making this an extremely durable product.
